title: Foundation & Project Setup
description: Initialize Next.js 16+ project with TypeScript, configure build tooling, establish folder structure, and set up development environment with all core dependencies.

stories.title: Bootstrap Next.js 16 with TypeScript and App Router
acceptance_criteria: Next.js 16+ initialized with App Router enabled
TypeScript configured with strict mode
ESLint and Prettier configured with recommended rules
Basic folder structure created: /app, /components, /lib, /content, /public
Development server runs successfully on localhost:3000
stories.apl_goal: Initialize Next.js 16+ project with TypeScript, App Router, ESLint, Prettier, and establish base folder structure following Next.js best practices
technical_notes: Configure next.config.js for optimal production builds
Set up tsconfig.json with path aliases (@/components, @/lib, etc.)

stories.title: Install and configure Tailwind CSS
acceptance_criteria: Tailwind CSS v3+ installed and configured
Custom theme variables defined for neo-brutalist palette (#0A0A0A, #333333, #A9A9A9)
Tailwind directives added to globals.css
JIT mode enabled for optimal bundle size
First test component renders with Tailwind classes successfully
stories.apl_goal: Install and configure Tailwind CSS with custom neo-brutalist dark theme, enable JIT mode, and verify styling works with test component
technical_notes: Configure tailwind.config.js with custom color palette
Add custom utilities for accessibility (focus-visible styles)

stories.title: Integrate Space Grotesk font with optimization
acceptance_criteria: Space Grotesk font family installed (self-hosted or next/font/google)
Font loading optimized with font-display: swap
Typography scale defined in Tailwind config (h1-h6, body, code)
FOIT/FOUT prevented with proper fallback fonts
Font files served with proper caching headers
stories.apl_goal: Integrate Space Grotesk font using next/font/google for optimal loading, configure typography scale in Tailwind, and ensure no layout shift during font loading
technical_notes: Set up fallback to system fonts (sans-serif stack)

stories.title: Configure MDX support with next-mdx-remote
acceptance_criteria: next-mdx-remote or @next/mdx installed and configured
MDX files can be parsed from /content/posts directory
Frontmatter extraction working (title, date, excerpt, slug)
Custom MDX components can be injected (for enhanced markdown)
Test MDX file renders successfully
stories.apl_goal: Set up MDX content pipeline with next-mdx-remote, configure frontmatter parsing with gray-matter, and create MDX components wrapper for custom rendering

stories.title: Create content directory structure and sample posts
acceptance_criteria: /content/posts directory created with proper structure
Frontmatter schema documented (title, date, excerpt, slug, tags, thumbnail, hero)
2 sample MDX posts created for development
Image storage pattern established (/public/images/posts/[slug]/)
Content loading utilities tested with sample posts
stories.apl_goal: Create /content/posts directory structure, define frontmatter schema, create 2 sample MDX posts with images, and verify content loading pipeline works end-to-end
technical_notes: Frontmatter should include: title, date, excerpt, slug, tags[], thumbnail, hero, published (boolean)
Sample posts should demonstrate code blocks and images

architectural_decisions: Next.js App Router for file-based routing and RSC support
TypeScript strict mode for type safety
Tailwind CSS with JIT for minimal bundle size
MDX for content authoring with frontmatter metadata
File-system based content management (no CMS needed)
